p: Territory of Washington In Justice Court before County of Walla Walla O P Lacy Justice of the Peace
To the constable or and the Keeper of Jail of said County

Whereas at a Justice Court held at my office in said County for the Trial of Adaline Oniel for the offense hereiniafter stated the said Adaline Oniel was convicted of being --- on the 29th day of March 1876 and for a long time of being a habitual drunkard and disorderly person and upon said conviction the said court did adjudje and determine that the said Adaline Oniel gave bonds in the sum of one hundred dollars for her good behavior for the term of three months or in default thereof that she be committed to the county Jail for the term of three months and whereas default has been in giving Bond as by me therefore you the said Constable are commanded in the name of the United States the said Adaline Oniel and deliver her to the said Keepeer and go to the
said Keeper are hereby commanded because the said Adaline Oniel your custody in said Jail and her there safely Keep until the 29th day of June 1876 or until she be discharged by due course of Law.
Territory of Washington vs Adaline Oniel Continued
